abstract: Russia’s strategy to secure a monopoly for Gazprom on exports to Asia is threatening an important investment by BP.
snippet: Russia’s strategy to secure a monopoly for Gazprom on exports to Asia is threatening an important investment by BP.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, May 28 — The Russian government continued Monday to press its strategy of securing for Gazprom, the state-owned natural gas company, a monopoly on exports to Asia.

headline.main: Kremlin Aim of Monopoly Threatens BP Gas Venture
headline.print_headline: Kremlin Aim of Monopoly Threatens BP Gas Venture
